mapper.select: select a.mid as mid,a.uid as uid ,a.fromuid as fromuid,a.fromuname as fromuname ,a.did as did ,a.gid as gid, a.mweight as mweight,a.fid as fid,us.uname as touname, d.department as department ,g.gname as gname,f.fname as fname from (select m.mid as mid,m.uid as uid ,m.fromuid as fromuid,e.uname as fromuname ,m.did as did ,m.gid as gid, m.mweight as mweight,m.fid as fid from message m left join users e on e.uid = m.fromuid inner join users u on (ISNULL(m.did) and ISNULL(m.gid) and ISNULL(m.uid)) or ( m.did=u.did and ISNULL(m.gid) and ISNULL(m.uid)) or (m.did =u.did and m.gid=u.gid and ISNULL(m.uid)) or (m.did = u.did and m.gid =u.gid and m.uid=u.uid) where u.uid=#{uid}) a left join users us on a.uid=us.uid left join groups g on a.gid= g.gid left join department d on a.did=d.did left join file f on a.fid=f.fid

select count(*) from message m inner join users u on ( m.did=u.did and ISNULL(m.gid) and ISNULL(m.uid)) or (m.did =u.did and m.gid=u.gid and ISNULL(m.uid)) or (m.did = u.did and m.gid =u.gid and m.uid=u.uid) where u.uid=#{uid}
select content from message where mid = #{mid}
